remarks: Another recursive expression for the transitive predecessors. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Apr-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dftrpred4g $p |- ( ( X e. A /\ R Se A ) -> TrPred ( R , A , X ) = U_ y e. Pred ( R , A , X ) ( { y } u. TrPred ( R , A , y ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
